mapper.sql: INFORMATION_ID, PERSON_ID, COMPANY_ID, EMPLOYEE_NUMBER, FULL_NAME, BIRTH_PLACE, BIRTH_DATE, PHOTO_FILE_PATH, GENDER_CODE, NATIONALITY_CODE, RELIGION_CODE, BLOOD_TYPE, BLOOD_TYPE_RHESUS, MOTHER_NAME, DISABILITY_CODE, DISABILITY_REMARK, HOBBY, IS_PILGRIMAGE, IS_SMOKER, ASTRA_JOIN_DATE, HIRE_DATE, HOME_BASE_CODE, PROBATION_END_DATE, TRAINING_END_DATE, MARITAL_STATUS, MARITAL_DATE, INTERNAL_MARRIED_WITH, PTKP_STATUS, WORKING_SCHEDULE_ID, EFFECTIVE_START_DATE, EFFECTIVE_END_DATE, CREATED_BY, CREATION_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE

'false' as QUERYID,
from PEA_PERSONAL_INFORMATIONS
order by ${orderByClause}
